int mErrId

Detailed Description

Errno like object.

This object is very much like errno or the GetLastError() function in Win32. It doesnt do anything dazzling. It just reports the last error. This class is sometimes useful, because it understands that its error id maps to a system string error, and it knows how to obtain the error.

virtual std::string sys::Err::toString (  )  const [virtual]
